    • Constructor Detail

      • MRepository

        public MRepository(java.lang.String fName,
                   int nrCoaches,
                   int nrContestants)
            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Initializes the logger (gameoftherope.log) file
        Parameters:
        fName - to be given to the logger that will be created
        nrCoaches - is the number of the coaches present in the simulation
        nrContestants - is the number of the contestants in the simulation
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - is thrown when fails to write/open the file
